verses.name: Acts 28:11
verses.text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria, which had wintered in the isle, whose sign was Castor and Pollux.

verses.name: Acts 28:12
verses.text: And landing at Syracuse, we tarried there three days.

verses.name: Acts 28:13
verses.text: And from thence we fetched a compass, and came to Rhegium: and after one day the south wind blew, and we came the next day to Puteoli:

verses.name: Acts 28:14
verses.text: Where we found brethren, and were desired to tarry with them seven days: and so we went toward Rome.
